original_text:
“Who will have pity on you, O Jerusalem,
    or who will grieve for you?
Who will turn aside
    to ask about your welfare?
korean_text: 예루살렘아 너를 불쌍히 여길 자 누구며 너를 위해 울 자 누구며 돌이켜 네 평안을 물을 자 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who will have pity on you, O Jerusalem,
sentences.korean_translation: 오 예루살렘아, 누가 너를 불쌍히 여기겠느냐,

sentences.original_text: or who will grieve for you?
Who will turn aside to ask about your welfare?”
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 발길을 돌려 너의 안녕을 묻겠느냐?”
